t: AMAZON COMMITS $147 MILLION TO CREATE AND PRESERVE 1,260 AFFORDABLE HOMES, PRIMARILY WITH MINORITY-LED DEVELOPERS ACROSS WASHINGTON, DC | MAYORMB
